definitions.definition: Performing a headcount ; the counting of people.
A system of remuneration for providers of health care, in which providers enroll patients as permanent clients and receive a fixed periodic payment for each enrollee .
A donation made to an educational institution to obtain admission .

main_definition: Performing a headcount ; the counting of people.
secondary_definitions: A system of remuneration for providers of health care, in which providers enroll patients as permanent clients and receive a fixed periodic payment for each enrollee .
( India , euphemistic ) A donation made to an educational institution to obtain admission .
